item.title: View and extract content from msi
item.description: Less MSIÃ©rables From their site A tool to view and extract the contents of an Windows Installer (.msi) file. It just works. No installation required. Browse all the contents of the msi file, extract single files, view tables. Usable from a nice simple GUI or from the command line.
